listing.listing_description: Sunset Beach Villa is a pristine vacation rental located in Leeward Estates, in the prestigious Grace Bay area of the Turks and Caicos. Just a two minute walk from the powdery white sands of this world renown beach. This luxury retreat provides a private villa experience within an ambience reminiscent of a beachside boutique hotel. Truly capture the essence of indoor/outdoor Caribbean living and make this holiday one for the books!No matter how much you love to wade and splash in the turquoise waters of the Caribbean Sea, you will no doubt enjoy having the convenience of a private swimming pool and alfresco shower right at home. The back of the villa opens up to an expansive outdoor area with a shaded terrace, beautiful pool area and elegant native landscaping. To optimize your beach holiday, this villa also provides use beach chairs and rafts as well as a cooler and beach towels. The covered outdoor kitchen has been equipped with a Weber S Series grill sits amid multiple entertaining areas for guests and family.The great room's open concept design with vaulted ceilings and A-frame windows provide a vast amount of natural light and visual space. This open space comprises a living area with a sectional couch and a television next to the contemporary formal dining area. The fully equipped kitchen features Quartz counter-tops, custom cabinetry, stainless steel appliances and a center island breakfast bar. We recommend this villa for a family holiday, a sunny beach honeymoon or an easy breezy social event such as a reunions, retreats, milestone birthdays and anniversaries.Five exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to ten guests at this non-smoking, air-conditioned villa. Each bedroom includes an en-suite bathroom, television, ceiling fan and a flat screen TV. The four master suites offers a king bed, and the other suite have two twin beds. The villa also includes a crisp, hotel-style linen package in each suite.In 2015, Grace Bay was awarded TripAdvisor’s coveted ‘Traveler’s Choice’ award for the top quality of its pure white sands and turquoise waters. Nearby outdoor activities include kite surfing, snorkeling and scuba diving. Nature lovers should be sure to check out Little Water Cay, a natural habitat full of friendly iguanas. You will also find the Provo Golf Club nearby, one of the most consistently top ranked courses in the Caribbean.

listing.listing_description: Indulge in 5,000 square feet of beachfront luxury at Palm Villa located at Idle Awhile resort's The Villas collection. Tucked beneath the palm trees just off Seven Mile Beach in Negril, this gorgeous vacation rental is only steps from Jamaica’s famed white sands and turquoise waters. Invite up to ten guests for a tropical getaway, family reunion or even a decadent honeymoon at this fully staffed property.Your holiday at Palm Villa includes the services of a chef, butler and housekeeper, as well as the use of water sports equipment like kayaks and sailboats. Guests over 18 are welcome at the fitness center at the Couples Swept Away resort. Palm Villa also has its own private pool, surrounded by a terrace with plenty of loungers, a breezy outdoor living area and a shaded al-fresco dining room.The home’s relaxed, open interiors make it easy to socialize or spend a quiet afternoon reading. Open the double-doors or wood-trimmed windows in the living room to let in breezes from the outdoor dining area, stretch out on the comfortable, citrus-hued sectional, or gather around the bar for refreshments. Though chef service is included in your stay, the villa has a fully equipped kitchen with both a breakfast bar and a breakfast nook.Each of the five bedrooms at Palm Villa has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, private terrace and ocean views. Details like four-poster beds, vaulted ceilings and wicker accent furniture give the bedroom suites an appeal that’s traditional yet comfortable.Though the oceanfront location, five-star service and thoughtful amenities make it tempting to simply stay at Palm Villa, the property is only a 5-minute walk from shopping, dining and nightlife options. For a stroll on a different beach, make the short drive to Orange Bay; for a uniquely Jamaican experience, head to the colorful waters of Blue Hole Mineral Spring.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Feel the wet sand between your fingers as gentle tamping shapes a castle wall. Shells gathered by smaller hands wait in colorful pails. But a call for lunch from the villa breaks the spell as everyone heads to the terrace where they can eat and keep their eye on the construction until they return. Glorious sun-filled days stretch lazily at this seafoam green two-story beachfront townhouse. An open porch and terrace with a rustic slat walkway lead to the villa. Gated and child-friendly, Hummingbird Villa is central to many activities and offers a long list of amenities to members. The beautiful freshwater swimming pool with a wood deck surround rimmed with comfortable loungers is close to the clubhouse with restaurant. Interested in snorkeling or boating? Head over to the marina for rentals and a dockside café that serves coffee and breakfast. Also, there’s a Tiki bar that serves drinks on the beach. Tennis courts and a children’s playground are nearby. Friday night music and Sunday barbecues are an opportunity to gather as a community and make new friends. Hummingbird Villa offers special add-on amenities as well: spa services, fresh groceries, even childcare in case you want to go duty-free shopping at Harbour Bay Shopping Center just 10km away or have dinner with friends in Nassau, just a 10-minute drive.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With 7 Mile Beach in your backyard and ocean views in every bedroom, you’ll be feeling that fresh sea breeze 24/7 at this beachfront villa in the Caymans. Catch up on some reading under the shade of a hay-thatched palapa. Get a golden vacation-tan in a beachfront sun lounger. Or chill out in the air conditioning. Then, head to Camana Bay for dinner, and maybe a little shopping. From the exterior, sunny pastels and palm trees decorate this sandy property. Inside, cream-white walls, ocean-inspired art, and contemporary furniture add a touch of beach-chic glamour. The kids will love the games lounge and when they’ve gone to bed, the older kids probably will too, especially after a trip to the wet bar. After a few games of pool, head to the rooftop hot tub and relax. In the afternoon, pick up some fresh seafood and produce from the local market for a backyard barbeque. Gather the crew around the alfresco dining table and show off your grill skills. After the appropriate 30-minutes, hop into a kayak or grab a paddleboard and move the party to the sea. Before dinner, recharge your batteries with a late-afternoon nap in one of the sunbeds. Meet some of the local critters at Stingray City. Explore the underwater wreckage of the USS Kittiwake with Cayman Turtle Divers, just off 7 Mile Beach. Golfers in the group will definitely want to check out the course at North Sound. Later, head to George Town for dinner followed by beachfront cocktails at sunset. Then, hit Obar Nightclub and dance the night away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Iris is located on the heights of Grand Cul de Sac in fabulous St. Barts with oceanfront views of Petit Cul de Sac Bay and the adjacent lagoon. The layout of this contemporary vacation rental has been organized so you can enjoy lush hillside and ocean views from every room. St. Barts has earned its reputation for being luxurious and exclusive. The beaches are secluded, the water is warm and the landscape is composed of beautiful hills and ravines. Live it up with Luxury Retreats!Outside, the beautiful infinity-edge swimming pool is perfect for having a splash or doing some laps. The deck features plenty of sun loungers, a lounge and a barbeque. Inside, you will find a television and Wi-Fi. The stylish bar makes entertaining a cinch. Your reservation includes housekeeping.The interiors of this private holiday home are ultra-modern, yet plush and comfortable. Underneath high vaulted ceilings that provide a quintessential Caribbean air, you will find a living room with cozy white couches and a contoured kitchen area with a cooking “bubble.” A large opening spanning the length of the room leads right out to the deck and the stunning view of the sea and islands.Two exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to four guests at this non-smoking villa. Both bedrooms offer king size beds, en-suite bathrooms, televisions and direct access to the terrace. We recommend this villa for a small family, a couples’ retreat or a honeymoon in the sun. Speak to our concierge about booking this wonderful site as the backdrop for a special celebration such as a wedding or anniversary.With a distinct French influence, St. Barts is sophisticated and laid back. Within minutes from Villa Iris, you will be able to access three fabulous beaches: Grand Cul de Sac, Marigot Beach and Petit Cul de Sac. In nearby Gustavia, St. Bart’s tiny and relaxed capital city, you will discover red roofed buildings that pop through the lush tropical landscape, and all the historical sites can be seen over a day of walking around town.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Past meets present in a one-of-a-kind setting at Porters Great House Cottage. Tucked amid the lush gardens and mahogany forest of the centuries-old Porters estate near the west coast of Barbados, this vacation rental is the perfect marriage of traditional island style and modern luxury. Its three bedrooms are spacious enough for a holiday with friends and family—yet intimate enough for a Caribbean honeymoon if you choose.After following a winding drive through the forest, you’ll arrive on the private cottage grounds, which feature a swimming pool, al-fresco living and dining areas, and an outdoor wet bar. There’s also a smart TV, Wi-Fi and exercise equipment inside. Your stay even includes the services of a cook and housekeeper.The cottage has both an original coral-stone exterior and a modern wing inspired by the charm of the older one, all filled with stylish pieces. The living spaces are arranged in a line and flow from one to the next, with the living room and fully equipped kitchen at either end, and a dining room that opens to a lily pond in the garden in the middle.The villa has one master bedroom with a king bed and two guest bedrooms with two twin beds each, which can be combined to form king beds if desired. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.From Porters Great House Cottage, it’s a short walk or drive to some of the best beaches and golf courses in the St. James area of the island. The closest beach is Colony Club, just 5 minutes away on foot, and the postcard-perfect stretches of both Sandy Lane and Paynes Bay beaches are less than 10 minutes away by car. If you’re keen to tee off, you’ll appreciate that both the Old Nine and Green Monkey courses at Sandy Lane are also less than a 10-minute drive from the cottage.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find a Bali-inspired hideaway tucked into a lush garden at Amanoka on Discovery Bay. Rooted in East Asian architecture and named after the Indonesian word for “peaceful home,” this Jamaica vacation rental draws on traditions from around the world—and a location on a private white-sand beach—to create a tranquil escape.Your holiday at Amanoka includes the services of two chefs, a butler and housekeepers. Not only that, but the villa is as well appointed as a boutique hotel, with its own beach, an infinity pool and hot tub, a tennis court, al-fresco living and dining areas, and air-conditioned gym and spa areas indoors. Kayaks, a sailboat and snorkeling gear are provided, making it easy to explore the crystal-clear waters just offshore.Open-sided living areas let the warm breezes waft over the open-concept sitting and dining spaces, while touches of dark carved wood and vibrant artwork show off the Balinese influences. The villa does have a fully equipped kitchen, but the chefs will be happy to prepare whatever you’d like.The seven bedrooms at this luxury property—three in the main house, four in the annex—can accommodate up to fourteen friends or family members. In the main house, there are two bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with two queen beds. The annex has two bedrooms with king beds, one bedroom with a queen bed and one bedroom with two twin beds. All seven bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.While the white sand and turquoise waters just in from of Amanoka make this villa feel like a honeymoon from the everyday, Discovery Bay is only an hour’s drive from the airport and shops (with transfers and driving service available at extra cost). If it’s just not a vacation without a round or two, make the 10-minute drive to the nearest golf course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Tropical sunshine, glimmering water and lush greenery play off each other at Cayuco 9. This Dominican Republic vacation rental is close to the beach in sunny, exclusive Cap Cana and set along the fairways of one of the Caribbean’s best golf courses. Beautiful water features wind their way through the open living spaces of this luxury home to a resort-worthy outdoor entertaining area.Your stay at Cayuco 9 begins with a transfer from Punta Cana’s international airport to the villa, where you’ll be welcomed by a fruit basket and a private check-in. A housekeeper and butler will be on hand during your holiday to see to your needs. You’ll want to spend most of your time in the outdoor entertaining area, which features a pool with a swim-up wet bar, a hot tub, a barbecue and lounging and dining areas both shaded and sunny.Inspired by the traditional aesthetic of the tropics, the open-air living and dining pavilions have soaring thatched roofs and polished stone floors. A built-in sectional and wicker sofas have room for the whole family, as does a dining area that seats ten. Inside the house, a cozy media room adjoins a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and practical island layout.All six bedrooms at Cayuco 9 have en-suite bathrooms and open to either a terrace or balcony; several also have al-fresco showers or bathtubs for a honeymoon-suite feel. There are two bedrooms with king beds, three with two queen beds each, and one room with two twin-over-full bunk beds that’s perfect for kids.Explore the planned community of Cap Cana on the villa’s bicycle or take the golf cart to the tennis courts, clubhouse or Punta Espada Golf Club—ranked as one of the top courses in the Caribbean. Make the short drive to Caleton Beach Club or Juanillo Beach for a stroll on the sugary sand, or depart from the nearby marina on a fishing expedition.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find your joy in the sparkling ocean, warm breezes and smooth fairways at Campo Bliss. Part of the exclusive Casa de Campo resort, this luxury Dominican Republic vacation rental is its own piece of Caribbean paradise, from its oceanfront location to its easy access to the beach and several golf courses. Personalized service, six suite-style bedrooms and chic, airy interiors give the villa all the pampering and style of your very own private boutique hotel.Your stay at Campo Bliss includes the services of a cook, waiter, housekeeper, groundskeeper and property manager, leaving you free to spend time with your family during your beach holiday or lounge with your sweetheart on your tropical honeymoon. And there is ample opportunity to relax at the villa: on one of the loungers on the sunny terrace, in the pool that stretches toward the water, in the hot tub overlooking the ocean or on the putting green. You can even take advantage of the warm Caribbean nights by heating up the barbecue and enjoying dinner at the al-fresco dining area.Fold-back walls, vaulted ceilings with windows near the peaks and wicker and rattan furniture blur the lines between indoors and out. Breezes waft freely through the bright great room, where wicker sofas with plump white cushions are arranged with armchairs around several coffee tables to create multiple conversation areas. A welcoming round table and wicker armchairs give the same trad yet relaxed feel in the dining area, and in the fully equipped kitchen, a breakfast bar makes it easy to stop off for a snack or cup of coffee.With so many outstanding amenities in the common areas, it’s no surprise that the six suite-style bedrooms are equally well appointed. There are three bedrooms with king beds and three with two double beds each; all have en-suite bathrooms and ocean views. Classic blue and white bedding, drapes and accent pillows create a look that’s both fresh and traditional, and red accents on upholstered benches or piped pillows is a jaunty touch in keeping with the seaside vibe.Start your stay at Campo Bliss with a flight into La Romana International Airport, 5.5 miles away, Punta Cana International Airport, 48 miles away, or Las Americas International Airport, 63 miles away. From the villa, it’s about 3 miles to the sands of Minitas Beach and the restaurants and vendors in downtown La Romana. Golfers will want to book tee times at nearby Dye Fore Golf Course, La Romana Country Club and La Estancia Golf Club. And of course, it’s always worth the 47-mile day trip to Punta Cana for the chance to stroll the famously beautiful beaches.Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Caribbean elegance meets beachfront bliss at Blake House. This spectacular Bahamas vacation rental in the Nassau and Paradise Island area is a refined retreat with stately architecture, spacious interiors and six bedroom suites. It’s also in a dream location, with white sand and turquoise waters just beyond your private pool. Make it the gorgeous backdrop to a getaway with friends or a milestone birthday or anniversary celebration with family. You’ll want to spend most of your holiday at the beach just outside your door or on the villa’s terrace, which features a swimming pool, living and dining areas, an al-fresco wet bar and a barbecue. Blake House is a true tropical estate, with graceful columns, fanlights and delicate trim lending traditional charm to the outside. Inside, it’s just as appealing, with crisp white walls and slipcovered chairs in the multiple sitting areas and open-concept dining area. The fully equipped kitchen takes a more modern approach, with chrome-legged stools at a marble-topped breakfast bar and sleek white cabinetry.This luxury property has three bedrooms with queen beds, including two with ocean views, and three bedrooms with double beds, including a children’s room. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and many have walk-in closets or open to a shared terrace.Just a moment or two on the beach in front of the house will show you why the Bahamas are such a popular destination for honeymooners and families alike. Put your toes into the soft sand or warm water and feel the breeze—and then stay there for the rest of the week. Of course, if you’d like to see more of the island, it’s only a 15-minute drive to the nearest downtown area with shops and restaurants, and a 25-minute drive to the Ocean Club Golf Course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Ixfalia is an amazing four-bedroom villa located on the heights of Saint Jean on the fabulous Caribbean island of St. Barts. This stunning vacation rental is located just a quick drive from town and a number of beaches as well as stylish boutiques and restaurants. With a beautiful view of the oceanfront and the white sands of the bay, you will be perfectly poised for the ultimate holiday in the sun!Ixfalia offers the amenities usually found at a boutique resort, but within the private space of a villa. Your family and friends will love the extra-long infinity swimming pool that more or less runs the entire length of the deck. You will also find a lovely alfresco dining area and plenty of lounging options including sun beds. The perks inside include an ice maker, espresso machine, satellite television, a sound system, Apple TV and Wi-Fi. There’s also an exercise room so you can stay on top of your workouts while away. Your reservation includes housekeeping.The overall decorative theme of Ixfalia could be described as a beachside dreamscape. With bright comfortable furnishings alongside copious wooden accents including organically shaped furnishings, sculptures, driftwood and curios, each space within this pristine residence epitomizes the idea of barefoot sophistication. High vaulted ceilings keep it cool inside!Four immaculate bedrooms host up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. Each bedroom includes an en-suite bathroom, queen size bed, dual vanity, television and air conditioning. Three suites are located in the guest house, while the stand-alone master suite makes a great bet for the honeymooning couple. The villa also makes an easy and breezy setting for a wedding, anniversary or birthday.St. Barts has earned its reputation for being luxurious and exclusive. The beaches are secluded, the water is warm and the landscape filled with glorious hills and ravines. With a distinct French influence, the island is sophisticated, yet laid back. In Gustavia, St. Barts’ tiny and relaxed capital city, you will discover red roofed buildings that pop through the lush tropical landscape, and all the historical sites can be seen over a the course of a leisurely day. Get the holiday you deserve with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: From its lofty perch on a verdant hillside, Vue de Rêves offers perhaps the most sublime ocean vistas on St. Barts. Redesigned in 2017 by a prominent French architect, the spectacular villa has hosted celebrity guests including the Kennedy family and singer Mariah Carey, a testament to its dream-like prospects, top-shelf amenities, and prime location within minutes of Gustavia, St.-Jean Bay, and enchanting beaches. Gourmet chefs will be inspired here, with an outdoor pizza oven and a superb French kitchen endowed with a La Cornue oven and range. Five superb king bedroom suites offer ideal accommodations for multiple couples, family reunions, and destination wedding guests.The villa blends the natural elements into a quintessential experience of this island paradise, with an infinite swimming pool and blazing fire pit harmonizing with the sweeping views of Eden Rock, Nikki Beach, and the Caribbean Sea. Enjoy peaceful days on the terrace, bathing in the crystalline water and basking on elegant lounge chairs and sunbeds. Relish an alfresco meal in the afternoon and relax in the breeze-swayed hammock. Savor delicious cocktails by the fire as the sunset yields to a vast canopy of stars.Ample pocket doors infuse the home with a plein-air ambiance. The fabulous kitchen features generous prep space and easily serves the villa's lounge and dining areas, as well as a lovely bar. The salon includes a large, flat-screen TV and sumptuous sofa, and the interior dining table is set beside the glass display-wall of a magnificent wine tasting room. Beautiful vaulted ceilings with pendant lighting form a luminous haven for nighttime gatherings. There is an office space if needed, and a private gym for workouts before a morning plunge.All five suites feature king beds, ensuite bathrooms, and truly gorgeous views. Four of the suites open to the pool terrace or balconies. The master additionally includes a walk-in closet and lovely alfresco shower. Air conditioning and ceiling fans ensure a comfortable atmosphere at all times.There is hardly a finer location on Saint Barthelemy for balancing privileged privacy with convenience. You're within minutes by car of Gustavia, St. Jean Bay, and several exquisite beaches, while the international airport is just two kilometers from your door.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The lush estate of Santosha is split over three unique properties and offers you absolute beachfront luxury with magnificent views over Long Bay. Your staff is on hand to tend to your every need, while full time security ensures complete privacy. Never before available for weekly rentals, this exclusive and splendid property is now welcoming guests to the secluded sands of Long Bay.From the moment you arrive, you’ll begin to wind down. Your ultra-luxury grand main house features spacious gathering places and superb wrap around porches for your family and friends to enjoy at their leisure, all while soaking up the tantalizing views of the gorgeous beach and the turquoise blue Caribbean Sea. Fancy a walk before breakfast? Step out onto the golden sands and take in Anguilla’s natural beauty, experience the quintessential beach destination flavored with the warmth and charm of the island. It’s getting hot, why not take a dip in your private perfectly heated pool? Or perhaps your butler or housekeeper can get you something cool to drink? Anyone for tennis? Your court awaits or head down to your own private beach grotto for a nap or a swim among the waves. Whatever your desires are your utmost comfort and luxury is assured at Santosha. The private hot tub, air conditioning, sound system and Wi-Fi all add to your feeling of total wellbeing.Santosha includes eight luxuriously established bedrooms all, of course, with lavish en-suites. The bedrooms are split over four charming properties offering you and your guests multiple and flexible accommodation arrangements. The main house includes four well-established Master bedrooms, and then of course there’s the Grand Master splendidly equipped with king size bed, en-suite bathroom with shower and jet tub, air conditioning, television, safe and balcony. Guest House Number 1 includes two lavish bedrooms while Guest House Number 2 with its one bedroom is an ideal romantic getaway for a couple. There is also a private gym in one of the Guest Houses. The Honeymoon Suite allows for privacy in your little slice of heaven. All properties ensure your total relaxation and privacy.Santosha is 10 km away from the town of The Valley and 10 km away from Crocus Hill. Cuisinart Resort Golf Course is just 3.5 km away. You’re right on the beach at Long Bay but for an alternative Shoal Bay Beach is just 5 km away and Sandy Ground Beach is 7.5 km away. The Ferry Terminal at Blowing Point is 7.5 km away, and Clayton J. Lloyd International Airport (AXA) is 9.5 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this villa is close to a construction project ending in January 2020. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Experience true peace and serenity with this pristine, beachfront Turks and Caicos mansion. Located on the golden sands of Grace Bay Beach, guests can walk from the cooled interior, under the latticework overhang, to the gentle surf and private dock. With every creature comfort and an impressive selection of premium bedrooms, local golf courses, tennis courts and seaside bars beckon from nearby.The slow rhythms of the ocean govern this island, with the steady surf and rustle of the palm trees casting their spell over guests at Vision Beach. Awaken each morning to dappled sunlight reflecting off the water and illuminating the dark wood and white fabrics of the bedrooms. Sparse, tasteful art pieces dot the home, with an impressive set of glass shades overhanging the impressive dining table. The home’s gym and media room are great choices for escaping the midday heat, with the pool being a great option for rapidly cooling off.This villa offers unrivalled access to a pristine beach. Unimpeded by other homes, guests can experience acre after acre of sand, water, and serene horizons. Take things to the next level with paddle boarding or kayaking around the shallows, or enjoy a vigorous afternoon at the local tennis or golf clubs, located just a short drive away. Return after an active day to the sizzling barbecue, to savor local seafood or freshly-caught crab, along with a cooling drink as the sun sinks into the darkening water that laps at the edges of the property.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: It doesn’t get much better than sitting in the pool and looking down at the Bay of St. Jean from Bastide on St. Barts. This brand-new luxury villa in Lurin is just a few minutes’ drive from charming Gustavia but feels miles away thanks to a setting on a private hilltop lot with views down to the sea. Open-plan interiors and three bedrooms can easily welcome a group of friends and family or become a romantic backdrop for a lavish Caribbean honeymoon.You’ve come to the island to enjoy the balmy weather, so slide open the villa’s glass doors and start your day with breakfast at the covered al-fresco dining area or the shaded lounge area. Bring a book and cold drink to a lounge chair on the sunny deck, or move the chairs into the shallow end of the infinity pool. Ease into the evening by tossing local seafood on the barbecue and passing out drinks from the outdoor bar or opening a selection from the wine cellar. You could stay out and watch the stars, or head inside to the media room.The villa’s bright, airy interiors blur the line between indoors and out. Sleek white furniture on the covered patio matches the crisp white upholstery on the indoor sofa, and the two spaces can be completely opened to each other via fold-away glass walls. The dining area gets a subtly tropical hit of pattern from blue and white chairs, and the fully equipped kitchen is both minimalist and warm thanks to flat-fronted wood cabinets.Bastide may be a vacation rental, but its bedrooms feel like suites at a boutique hotel. Each has a queen bed and en-suite bathroom, two have al-fresco showers and one opens to a private terrace. Built-in headboards, vaulted ceilings, large windows and crisp white bedding give the rooms clean lines and a soothing feel, and the spacious bathrooms invite you to linger in spa-worthy wood-floored showers.During your holiday, plan to spend at least one day at the beach, whether you make the 15-minute walk to Shell Beach or the 3.4 km drive to St. Jean Beach. Spend an afternoon or evening exploring Gustavia, a 5-minute drive from the villa and a great spot for window shopping or dining out. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 2.6 km drive from Bastide to the island’s Gustaf III Airport.Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Settle into laid-back island living at Whispering Waters on Discovery Bay. Everything about this oceanfront vacation rental in Jamaica, from its private beach and range of amenities to its vibrant decor, is designed to relax and rejuvenate. There’s even a full staff to ensure that you and up to fourteen friends or family members can enjoy the picture-perfect setting and seven-bedroom house with total ease.Whispering Waters has all the amenities of a boutique hotel, from a pool and hot tub overlooking the private white-sand beach to a lit tennis court, kayaks and snorkeling gear. Let the chef, assistant chef, two butlers and housekeeper worry about the details; all you have to do is sit down to dinner at the al-fresco table. For your comfort and convenience, the house also has Wi-Fi, an air-conditioned exercise room and available baby equipment.The villa’s lush surroundings are reflected in the vibrant hues and palm prints of the tropical-inspired interiors. When you’re not sitting out on the wide veranda, open the French doors to let the warm breeze flow through the living and dining rooms.This luxury property has five bedrooms with king beds, including the master suite, and two bedrooms with two double beds each. All seven bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, and several have access to a terrace or balcony along with views over the bay.The Discovery Bay location of Whispering Waters puts you in a honeymoon-worthy spot on the water and just minutes from shopping, dining and attractions such as Columbus Park and the Green Grotto Caves. If you’ll be on holiday with a larger group, consider booking Keela Wee, the villa just next door with six bedrooms of its own.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Tamarind House means different things to the people who have already experienced its beauty and legendary hospitality. The rare luxury of space and privacy. Room to relax, to breathe, to rejuvenate and dream. Happy memories of drinks and laughter under the tamarind tree. Long white curtains billowing in the breeze. Swimming in the pool under a full moon. Bouganvillea climbing the walls - fuchsia, violet and orange flowers set against a clear blue sea and sky. Rum cocktails and fish cakes at sunset.Tamarind House is located just off the Anse Chastanet Road; just under two miles from Soufriere and five minutes from Anse Chastanet beach. This exceptionally large house is constructed of local stone with high greenheart ceilings and Barbados tile floors throughout.A staircase descending from the car park, leads you into a cool, circular courtyard filled with banana plants and flowers. As you pass through the graceful arched doorway, the enormous living room stretches away before you and leads to the terrace where the tamarind tree grows up out of the tiles. This fabulous tree provides the home with shade cooler temperatures throughout the day. The extensive, totally private pool is situated below the Cottage and looks out over a stunning view of the Pitons. Below the pool, there is a professional size tennis court with a Bioflex surface and, of course, more superb views of the Pitons.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: One of three identical Garden Villas in Bonaire available through Luxury Retreats, Tortuga offers a walled garden and private saltwater pool just 100 feet from the waterfront. Bonaire is a small Dutch Caribbean island featuring unspoiled beauty, spectacular coral reefs and consistently warm temperatures. Unwind in the sun with a good book and tropical drink in hand on one of the cozy lounge chairs.If you need to cool down, take a dip in the saltwater pool. There is also a covered gazebo with plush seating that makes for an excellent shaded getaway. Cook up some hamburgers or fresh seafood on the outdoor grill and enjoy an alfresco meal. The home's lounge area is an open-air plan letting you easily move from inside the home into the garden.Dark polished floors nicely contrast the light and dark furnishings and decor. A fully equipped kitchen features a breakfast bar and modern appliances. The four bedrooms feature double-sized beds with mosquito net canopies and come fully air conditioned. Three bedrooms are located on the top floor, two with a private ensuite bathroom and stand-alone shower. On this island paradise you’ll find fantastic snorkeling only five minutes away, as well as a wealth of other water activities. This is one of three identical Garden Villas available through Luxury Retreats. For larger groups, ask your Villa Specialist for additional availability at the nearby Iguana or Delfin villas. Photos are representative of the Garden Villas’ layout and quality and are not villa-specific; actual decor may vary slightly..The Tortuga is one of two identical Garden Villas available through Luxury Retreats. listing.listing_description: With classic Caribbean charm and modern luxury amenities, Mango Hill Greathouse is the perfect blend of the traditional and contemporary. Built in 2006, this stunning St. Croix vacation rental takes its style cues from the Danish colonial plantation estates that once dotted the island. Its location in the exclusive Shoys Estate enclave affords views from Buck Island to Christiansted Harbor, and puts guests within a short walk of the beach and the Buccaneer Resort.A deep veranda lined with graceful colonnades leads to the villa’s 2,500 square feet of outdoor living space. Sip refreshments at the shaded living and dining areas, bask in the sun on a lounger on the terrace or swim in the sparkling pool. As the sun sinks toward the water, heat up the barbecue and try out fresh local seafood, serve drinks from the indoor bar and end the evening with a movie in the media room.A host of quintessential features gives the interiors of Mango Hill Greathouse ample traditional appeal—think wooden floors covered by natural-fiber area rugs, whitewashed beamed ceilings, arched doorways and elegant rattan furniture. A mix of West Indian art and European antiques is refined yet comfortable and inviting, and a fully equipped kitchen adds a practical side.The villa’s four bedrooms can accommodate up to eight friends or a group of extended family; all four have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning. There are three bedrooms in the main house: one with a king bed, one with a queen bed and one with two twin beds. The fourth bedroom, with a king bed, is in a separate pool house and could be used as a private, honeymoon-style retreat.Let Mango Hill Greathouse be the gorgeous backdrop to a milestone birthday or anniversary celebration or even an intimate destination wedding. Or use your holiday to explore St. Croix, from the tennis, golf and spa facilities of the nearby Buccaneer Resort to the galleries, boutiques and restaurants of Christiansted. If you’re simply in need of Caribbean sun and sand, make the 5-minute walk down to Shoys Beach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Kailani is an extraordinary, five-bedroom villa in the St. James area of Barbados, about ten minutes from Holetown. Perched at a serene remove along a coastal ridge near the western shore, the home enjoys panoramic sunset views of the Caribbean Sea from its ample pool terrace, interior great room, and master bedroom suite. Minutes from world-class beaches, watersports, and golf courses, this vacation rental is an ideal choice for families and groups of friends seeking privacy and a unique experience of tropical paradise.The villa is wonderfully positioned and designed such that the blue Caribbean sea and sky are visible through the front entrance as your arrive. The vista seems to bloom as you enter the home, widening in the expansive veranda and reaching 180 degrees from the half-moon swimming pool. Multiple lounge and dining areas invite you to dreamy hours in the Barbadian light, while a covered hot tub welcomes soothing soaks in the sea-kissed breeze.The centerpiece of the home is its fabulous veranda, pairing a twelve-person dining table with a vaulted salon—both with expansive views of the horizon. The interior kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances, while the outdoor kitchen features a large grill, stove, and fridge. The villa also features a media lounge for cozy movie nights, as well as a home office and well-equipped gym.The main house includes four spacious bedrooms, each with king bed, walk-in closet, air conditioning, and ensuite bathroom. The master suite enjoys a corner location with doors opening to the veranda, pool, and ocean views. A separate cottage also includes a king bed and ensuite bathroom, while enjoying its own lounge and kitchenette. Like the rest of the villa, the bedrooms offer an understated yet elegant ambiance, with rich wood accents complementing fresh white wall finishes that grow luminous in the island light.The villa is just ten minutes from Holetown and an easy drive to Sandy Lane Beach, Mullins Beach, and Gibbs Beach. Golfers are minutes from Green Monkey Golf Course at Sandy Lane as well as Royal Westmoreland. Grantley Adams International Airport is less than fourteen kilometers away, making Kailani a convenient choice for destination wedding guests or hassle-free family escapes.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This charming Creole style villa is a peaceful oasis set in a lush and colorful tropical garden. The view combines iconic Caribbean elements; swaying palms, beautiful foliage and glimpses of the sapphire sea. Whether you are relaxing inside or lounging outside, it is beautiful, private and poetically romantic. It is also a versatile villa. You can rent it alone for a honeymoon or cozy getaway. For larger gatherings, it can be rented along with its sister villa, La Pinta, to expand capacity. The two villas also share a tennis court and gym. This self-contained paradise is a wonderful place to simply shut the door on the world.La Nina makes the most of its outdoor spaces. The beautiful crystal clear pool is the center piece of the spacious covered terraces and sundecks. You have multiple choices for lounging and al fresco dining allowing you to accommodate small or large parties.The interior living space, with areas for lounging and dining, is an open plan concept, flowing seamlessly from inside to outside. Large pocket doors disappear into the wall allowing the view and breeze to come inside. The décor is contemporary with a cozy vibe. Oversized taupe wicker and cream fabrics complement the amazing stone wall in the living room. Charming painted furniture in neutral tones create a modern twist to Creole classics. The sleek, well equipped kitchen opens to the terraces allowing the chef to connect with the guests.The two equal size bedrooms are set off the pool deck. The décor is fresh and contemporary with an old world Caribbean twist. Painted furnishing in taupe and cream are complimented by elegant linens in tan, cream and white and colorful artwork. The feel is cozy and elegant. The en suite spa style bathrooms are beautifully detailed in travertine tiles, sculpted sinks and walk in showers.Although secluded, you are close to amenities. Long Bay and Plum Bay beaches are a short drive. You are ten minutes to the airport. Grand Case is only 25 minutes by car or head to Phillipsburg for some Duty Free shopping.

listing.listing_description: Let turquoise waters and sunny skies inspire the holiday you’ve always imagined at Dream Big Villa. Set on the postcard-perfect shores of Sapodilla Bay, this Turks and Caicos vacation rental puts the island’s world-class beaches at your doorstep. Contemporary design, eight bedrooms and an attentive staff give you the luxury of a resort in the comfortable ambience of a private residence.Your stay begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a live-in manager, housekeeper and security guard. Make the most of the Caribbean weather in outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, tennis and half-basketball courts, lounging and dining areas, and a barbecue, or take the provided kayaks, paddleboards and bicycles out to explore. Or enjoy the villa’s exercise and games rooms, home theater and wet bar.Designed as a family getaway, Dream Big Villa has more than 15,000 square feet of indoor and outdoor living space. They’re seamlessly connected by glass walls that can be slid open to let the warm breezes waft over the living and dining rooms. Sophisticated beach-house-inspired furnishings make for an inviting feel throughout, and the fully equipped kitchen has an equally welcoming breakfast bar.The villa has four bedrooms with king beds, two bedrooms with queen beds, one bedroom with two twin beds and one bunk room with three twin bunk beds. All eight bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, and several have their own entrances, making them ideal for couples wanting a honeymoon-worthy haven.Though Dream Big Villa is beachfront to Sapodilla Bay at low tide, it’s well worth making the short drive to scope out the sand at nearby Taylor Bay, Babalua Beach and world-famous Grace Bay. If you’re an avid player, you won’t want to miss the chance to tee off in a spectacular setting at Provo Golf Club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Play in the luminous surf of Lorient Bay and return on foot to intimate dinners paired with vast Caribbean vistas. Perched on a verdant slope in Camaruche, this newly built villa features sweeping ocean views from its sandy sundeck, breezy interiors, and 3 king bedroom suites. Cater private festivities in your gourmet kitchen or celebrate at the famous nightspots of the North Shore and Gustavia.A swimming pool (measuring 13.1 by 29.5 feet) is perched directly outside the villa's interior living areas and master bedroom, inviting you to a refreshing dip under the morning sun or evening stars. The sandy terrace is like a private slice of beach on your lofty perch, while Lorient Beach itself is a ten-minute walk downhill.Ample thresholds open between the pool deck and interior living areas, infusing the home with fresh ocean air. This open-concept space includes a comfortable TV lounge under a vaulted ceiling, flanked by a fully equipped kitchen and semi-alfresco dining table. White surfaces accentuate the natural beauty and lush colors of the vistas, complementing the deft touches of sea-inspired décor.Each of the bedroom suites features a king bed, mini-bar, safe, Apple TV, ensuite bathroom, and alfresco shower. The master opens directly to the pool, and all three bedrooms enjoy sea views.In addition to Lorient Beach just down the road, you're a short drive from Nikki Beach, Petit Cul de Sac Beach, and St. Jean. Drive 15 minutes to Gustavia for a classic Caribbean cocktail, or catch the ferry to the extraordinary Saint Barthelemy Natural Preserve.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A beach-entry pool and the golden sands of Plum Bay Beach are the double feature on show at this Mediterranean-style St. Martin estate. Tiled roofs and loggias curve around a verdant lawn and the pool, which itself curves around a swim-up bar as a water feature jets toward the sky. Bring snorkel gear and surfboards on the 10-minute walk to Plum Bay Beach—or a towel to lay on its golden sands.Kids of all ages will want to play with the pool toys and whoosh down the waterslide in the two heated pools. For the grown-ups in the family, there’s also an al-fresco bar, barbecue, and lounging and dining areas, as well as a private tennis court. There’s a gym to help you keep up with your routine, a wine cooler to help you indulge, and a full staff to help keep you comfortable on holiday.Follow the polished stone floors across the veranda to the sleek interiors of this contemporary home, which can be walled off using glass or opened to the tropical breeze. White upholstery and glass tables lend an airy feel to the dining room, while a pair of built-in sectionals beckons in the living room. While there is chef service, there’s also a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.This vacation rental has five bedrooms with king beds, several of which open to their own terrace, one bedroom with a queen bed, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All seven bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and TVs.A 10-minute walk brings you from this luxury Terres Basses enclave to Plum Bay Beach, where you can snorkel, surf, or join honeymooners on the soft golden sand. It’s a 3-minute drive to the white-sand stretch of Long Bay Beach, where you might spot the occasional celeb, and a 5-minute drive to Baie Rouge, which gets its name from its pale pink sand.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find a sleek, spacious, private destination for a Caribbean holiday at Villa Coral Bavaro. This tropical hideaway in Punta Cana is perfect for hosting a family reunion, celebrating a milestone birthday with friends or holding a sun-kissed wedding—or simply relaxing at nearby beaches and golf courses, which include some of the best in the Dominican Republic.Your stay at the villa includes the services of a chef and housekeeper. Entertain or unwind in outdoor living areas with a resort-worthy pool and hot tub, plenty of loungers in the sun, a shaded al-fresco dining area for ten, plus a barbecue and wet bar. After sunset, look to the Apple TV, sound system, Wi-Fi and games room with poker table for fun.Creamy stone and wood accents warm up the villa’s contemporary architecture for an inviting feel. Meanwhile, fold-away glass walls open the living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen to the terrace, so you can bring the island’s sunshine and balmy breezes indoors. There’s seating for sixteen around the dining table and even more at the kitchen’s breakfast bar.This luxury vacation rental has three bedrooms with queen beds, two bedrooms with queen beds and twin beds, and two bedrooms with double beds, all of which have en-suite bathrooms. The eighth bedroom has two bunk beds and is perfect for groups traveling with younger children.Villa Coral Bavaro is just a short drive from Bavaro Town and the beautiful Dreams Palm Beach Punta Cana, where you can join honeymooners on a picturesque stretch of sand, as well as Corales Golf Course and La Cana Beach Club. For a wonderful day trip, head to Ojos Indigenas Ecological Park, where you can follow trails to a dozen crystal-clear freshwater lagoons or make a few new friends in the petting zoo.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in Maundays Bay in Anguilla, Harmony at Sheriva villa successfully harmonizes traditional Caribbean style with touches from the Far East. Known for its pristine white sand beaches and clear turquoise seas, Anguilla offers a casual island tempo so you can get the rest and relaxation you deserve. With postcard perfect views of neighboring St. Martin and the Caribbean Sea, this chic villa redefines the art of luxury escape.All three main level rooms have direct access to the expansive terrace which leads to the infinity swimming pool with a built-in hot tub. You will find a second swimming pool on the lower deck. Step out of the water into an alfresco shower. The elegant shared spaces offer tech-savvy comforts such as plasma televisions, DVD players, poolside Bose surround sound and Wi-Fi so that your stay can be as relaxing or as festive as you desire. Fire up the barbeque and enjoy some outdoor dining as you overlook the tropical landscape. A complimentary golf cart helps you zip around. Indoors, you will find a media room with a wet bar. Your reservation includes housekeeping, night security and a variety of perks.The finest materials accent every inch of this expansive haven including exquisite marble floors and balustrades, exotic hardwood ceilings and immaculate granite countertops. The sunken living room exudes the richness of elegant island living. The kitchen offers contemporary comforts such as GE Monogram appliances.The Grand Villa Suite features a walk-in dressing room, Balinese daybed lounge area, double showers and an infinity-edge marble bathtub. The ground floor offers a two-bedroom suite with an entertainment/media room with wet bar and kitchenette. The king en-suite with garden view boasts a heavenly bathroom accented with marble and travertine. The king garden suite with its unique ‘tunnel’ design rounds out the ground floor. The Loft Suite has a balcony, kitchenette and adjacent sun terrace. The eight bedrooms accommodate up to eighteen guests.Due to its pristine decor and idyllic tropical setting, Harmony at Sheriva has become a popular spot for weddings and other special events. The villa is perfect for large family get-togethers and corporate retreats. Additional rate-inclusive services include a welcome wine basket, afternoon canapés, complimentary shuttle service to Maundays Bay beach, beach chairs and umbrellas as well as signing privileges at Cap Juluca’s three world class restaurants – Pimms, Blu and Spice.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Punta Cana, on the easternmost edge of the Dominican Republic, is world-renowned for its beaches, golf, spas, eco-adventures, and pure natural beauty. At this five-bedroom villa within the deluxe Punta Cana Resort, you'll be ideally situated to enjoy this confluence of Caribbean delights, while relishing the privacy of your own sanctuary.Surrounded by lush tropical flora, this two-floor vacation rental features a large outdoor terrace with swimming pool. Poolside loungers, a sun bed, a hammock strung between palms, and a lounge area beneath a lovely lattice-work cover give you ample relaxation options in sun or shade. In the evening, fix cocktails at the covered wet bar before dining at the alfresco table for eight. Excellent lighting keeps the terrace luminous throughout the night.Several sets of white French doors open into the spacious interior. With high ceilings, classy but comfortable furniture, and fresh breezes blowing in, the living room is ideal for late-night conversation among family and friends. There is also a formal dining area with a beautiful wooden table for eight, as well as a fully equipped kitchen. The décor epitomizes modern Caribbean elegance.The bedrooms are comfortable but cool, ideal for siestas in the warm afternoon or sleeping in after a festive night. There are four bedrooms in the main house: the master suite with king size bed and doors to the pool terrace, a second room with king bed, and two rooms with two full size beds. All of the main-house bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone showers. There's also a guesthouse with king bed and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and stand-alone bathtub. Each of the rooms has beautiful windows for welcoming the breeze.Located within the Punta Cana Resort and Club, the villa gives you effortless access to myriad options for leisure and adventure. Hop in the golf car and ride about five minutes to the beach at La Cana Beach Club or to the resort's private tennis courts and golf club. Treat yourself to a day at Spa 6 Senses, also only minutes away. And when you're in the mood for eco-adventure, don't miss the nearby Ojos Indígenas Ecological Park and Reserve, a somewhat off-radar gem with tropical forest hikes and crystalline swimming lagoons.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A pyramid rises, Louvre-like, from beside a reflecting pool in the garden of this one-of-a-kind contemporary retreat on Pointe Milou. The villa faces north and west over the ocean for spectacular sunset views, but its outdoor entertaining areas are shaded by a thoughtfully designed cantilevered roof, lest the sun get in your eyes. Swim and snorkel off palm-lined Marigot Beach, 3 minutes away. After you’re escorted to the villa and welcomed by the staff, you can dip into the infinity pool, take a book to one of the loungers on the terrace, or put something fresh from the sea on the barbecue to savor at the al-fresco dining table while you watch the sun go down. Once you’ve seen the stars come out, go inside to flip on the Apple TV and integrated sound system or share photos with family and friends at home via Wi-Fi. Slide-away glass walls are a seamless link between the pool terrace and the great room at this luxury property. Small statues watch over the living and dining areas, which are separated from the sleek fully equipped kitchen by a curved countertop. Each of the three bedrooms at this vacation rental has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and air conditioning. Two of the bedrooms have honeymoon-suite-worthy private terraces with plunge pools, while the third bedroom has a private terrace with a hot tub. While on holiday at Pyramide, you’re a 10-minute drive or less from four gorgeous beaches, including the clear waters of Marigot Beach and surfer-favorite Lorient Beach. Bring your camera or your dive equipment to Saint Barthelemy Nature Reserve, where several reefs and wrecks are waiting to be explored, and your appetite to picturesque Gustavia, where dining and shopping options abound in traditional red-roofed buildings. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located within walking distance to three of Jamaica’s most beautiful beaches, this oceanfront home is the perfect destination for those in search of a secluded Caribbean getaway. With three en-suite bedrooms, all featuring king beds and ocean views, Sea Biscuit is great for a couples retreat or vacation with friends, as well as a honeymoon with a little extra space. The Hermosa Cove area has been a favorite destination for Hollywood's elite ever since it was popularized by the likes of Marylin Monroe and Joan Collins in the nineteen-fifties. Nearby, you’ll find the quaint village of Ocho Rios, plenty of beachfront, and more.Decorated to embrace its natural surroundings, Sea Biscuit utilized the color palette of the Caribbean to create a space that is both fun and formal. White-washed walls provide elegance to spaces like the formal dining area and living room while allowing contrasting colors and wood tones to pop with excitement. In the kitchen, you’ll appreciate the state of the art appliances and a bright, functional working space.Sea Biscuit’s oceanfront terrace is likely where you’ll spend most of your time, sipping cocktails in the gazebo, enjoying scenic alfresco dinners, and cooling off in the refreshing plunge pool. The multiple furnished living areas outside make it easy for the whole group to gather as one, or break away for more intimate moments. If you’d prefer the comfort of the air conditioning inside, retreat to the living room and enjoy the villa’s Wi-Fi, streaming television, and Sonos sound system. And, to make your stay even more relaxing, Sea Biscuit comes with a housekeeper, butler, continental breakfast, and laundry service.The nearest beach to home is Hermosa Cove, just one minute’s walk from Sea Biscuit. Travel a few minutes further and you’ll find yourself on the sandy shores Mahogany or Sandals Ochi beaches. If you’re traveling with kids or the young at heart, Dolphin Cove is the perfect place to interact with the Caribbean’s most friendly sea critters. And, for dining, shopping, and nightlife, Ocho Rios is just a few minutes drive from the turquoise shores of villa Sea Biscuit.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: _ Please note that this property is in close proximity to a construction project. For more information, please contact us. _Nestled in the quiet hillside of Deve, this brand new home overlooks the ocean and Toiny Bay and is one of our most stylish St. Barts vacation rentals. You will fall in love with the unspoiled tropical island of St Barts with its relaxed atmosphere and abundance of beautiful sandy beaches. It’s also home to excellent boutique shopping and some of the Caribbean’s finest restaurants.The modern back patio offers plenty of spots to soak in some rays—whether you choose one of the cushioned lounge chairs or double-sized sunbeds. They surround the infinity-edge pool that spans the length of the deck and lights up for nighttime swims. Fire up the barbecue for an alfresco meal and serve it on the outdoor dining table that has seating for eight. A daily housekeeping service (except for Sundays and holidays) is an added bonus.From the patio, you can step into the villa’s open-concept living room. This space is stylish with modern furnishings, chic wallpaper (including an image of a pink dog) and funky light fixtures. It flows into the sleek, well-equipped kitchen, where you’ll find all the appliances you need to craft an island-inspired meal. There’s also offers an espresso machine for early morning caffeine fixes.The villa’s four air-conditioned bedrooms can accommodate up to eight guests (children of all ages are welcome here), and each suite includes a queen-sized bed, en-suite bathroom with a shower and a television with a DVD player. Three bedrooms feature ocean views, and two are located in separate bungalows (one is more suitable for staff members or teenagers).When you’re ready for some surf and sand, the nearest beach is Lorient—a reef-protected spot with calm waters that are perfect for swimming. You’ll find diverse restaurants, boutiques and gift shops in the island’s capital, Gustavia, 8.1 km from the villa.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The Papaye is one of our most secluded and prestigious St. Barts villas. Nestled in the Caribbean Sea, the island of St. Barts is a tropical paradise popular for its unspoiled white sandy beaches, private atmosphere and reputation of attracting the rich and famous from around the world.Just steps from the door is a large, half-circle pool boasting views of the bay of Petit Cul de Sac. The deck features high-end patio furniture, with sun beds near the pool and comfy chairs under the shaded terrace. On either side of the pool are steps leading down towards another private patio overlooking the sea. Located on the edge of the property, you will have unobstructed views of the turquoise colors of the bay as well as amazing sunsets. Upon request, you also have access to a private chef, electric car and a maid service.The interior of this elegant home boasts recently refreshed wooden flooring, soaring ceilings and modern, white furnishings. The open-concept living room opens up to the back terrace via large sliding doors. Next to the seating area is a contemporary dining area with seating for up to eight. Whip up a home-cooked meal in the fully equipped kitchen with granite countertops and a breakfast bar.This luxury villa has four bedrooms that can comfortably sleep up to eight guests, and each suite includes a private bathroom and king-sized beds (one suite has two twin-sized beds that can be converted into a king). One of the bedrooms is located in a separate apartment near the entrance of the villa.The villa is part of the private gated community of Domaine du Levant and is just steps away from the beach on Petit Cul de Sac. As a resident of the villa you are allowed to access the community’s private tennis courts on the beach. Meanwhile, a 9.8 km drive brings you to the restaurants and boutiques of the island’s capital, Gustavia.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
